resources.string: Press the button to check for another liquid
The stored liquids have been cleared
Make sure that the light sensor is clear so that the default light level can be measured
Detected liquid will be displayed here
Background light level has been measured (%d) so you can place the liquid on the sensor
A name needs to be given for the liquid being registered.
The existing entry for \'%s\' is being replaced
Do you really want to delete the entry for \'%s\'
All of the stored liquids have been deleted.
